en: He felt a sharp pain.
He is a sanitary inspector.
He believes that he is a hero.
He was regarded as a hero.
Hero as he was, he was not boastful.
zh: 虽然他是英雄，但他一点儿也不自大。

en: He majors in English literature.
He went to England for the purpose of studying English literature.
zh: 他去英国是为了学英语文学。

en: He is a master of English literature.
He devoted himself to the study of English literature.
zh: 他致力于研究英语文学。

en: He doesn't know how to write a letter in English.
He went to Britain to deepen his knowledge of the culture.
zh: 他去英国是为了深入了解那里的文化。

en: Born in England, he speaks British English.
zh: 他出生在英国，说的是英式英语。

en: He is a British citizen, but lives in India.
zh: 他是英国公民，但住在印度。

en: He studied English history.
He is well acquainted with the history of England.
zh: 他对英国历史非常了解。

en: He is proud of being a British subject.
zh: 他为自己是英国公民而感到自豪。

en: He had learned English before he left for England.
zh: 他在去英国之前就学过英语了。

en: He joined the English club.
He is qualified as an English teacher.
zh: 他有当英语老师的资格。

en: He has some experience in teaching English.
He knows no foreign language except English.
zh: 除了英语，他不会说其他外语。

en: He has two languages at his command besides English.
zh: 除了英语，他还掌握了另外两门语言。

en: Does he speak English?
Can he speak English?
He can't speak English, much less French.
zh: 他连英语都不会说，更别提法语了。

en: He cannot speak English, much less French.
zh: 他不会说英语，更不用说法语了。

en: He acquired the ability to speak English.
Has he become able to speak English?
He is a good speaker of English.
He flatters himself that he is the best speaker of English.
zh: 他自以为英语说得最好。

en: He is a very good speaker of English.
He is terrible at speaking English.
He never speaks English without making a few mistakes.
zh: 他一开口说英语准会出错。

en: He can't speak English.
He started to speak English.
He speaks English.
He is speaking English.
He has to speak English.
He mastered English easily.
zh: 他轻而易举地掌握了英语。

en: He speaks English like a native.
zh: 他的英语说得跟母语人士一样地道。

en: He went up to Tokyo with the intention of studying English.
zh: 他去东京是为了学英语。

en: He went to London to study English.
He went to America to study English.
He went to the United States to study English.
He is studying English, but he is also studying German.
zh: 他在学英语，同时也在学德语。

en: He can read and write English as well.
He knows no English.
He doesn't know English.
He does not know English, much less French.
zh: 他不懂英语，更不用说法语了。

en: I decided to go to college to major in English.
zh: 我决定上大学主修英语。

en: He speaks English a little.
He cannot write English without making mistakes.
He began to learn English.
He teaches English.
He has a perfect command of English.
He earns his living by teaching English.
Besides teaching English, he writes novels.
zh: 除了教英语，他还写小说。

en: He went abroad with a view to learning English.
He went abroad for the purpose of studying English.
zh: 他出国的目的是为了学英语。

en: He went abroad to study English.
He went there to learn English.
He has a good grasp of English.
He is superior to me in his good knowledge of English.
zh: 他的英语水平比我高多了。

en: He speaks English as fluently as if he were an American.
zh: 他的英语说得跟美国人一样溜。

en: He doesn't know English at all.
He speaks English very well.
He speaks English fluently.
He is improving in speaking English.
He never speaks English without making mistakes.
He has a good command of English.
He can speak Spanish, not to mention English.
zh: 他连西班牙语都会说，更别提英语了。

en: He can speak French, not to mention English.
zh: 他连法语都会说，更别提英语了。

en: He can speak neither English nor French.
zh: 他既不会说英语，也不会说法语。

en: He speaks both English and French.
He can speak both English and French very well.
zh: 他的英语和法语都说得特别好。

en: He can speak both English and German.
He speaks French, not to speak of English.
zh: 他会说法语，更不用说英语了。

en: He is superior to me in English.
He can speak French and German, not to mention English.
zh: 他会说法语和德语，更别提英语了。

en: Obviously he speaks English, but he can even speak Spanish.
zh: 显而易见他会说英语，甚至还会说西班牙语。

en: He can speak not only English but also German.
zh: 他不仅会说英语，还会说德语。

en: He has made rapid progress in English.
He's working at his English.
He is very zealous in his study of English.
He is busy learning English.
He is getting on very well with his English.
zh: 他的英语学得挺顺利的。

en: He is a teacher of English.
He is an English teacher.
He fell behind in his English class.
Does he write an English letter?
Does he write letters in English?
Does he write English letters?
He writes an English letter.
He passed his English examination.
He made two mistakes in the English test.
zh: 他在英语考试中出了两个错。

en: He wants to learn some English songs.
He can speak not only English but also French.
zh: 他不仅会说英语，还会说法语。

en: He went to America last year to brush up his English.
zh: 他去年去美国进修英语了。

en: He is quite at home in English.
He can speak French in addition to English.
zh: 除了英语，他还会说法语。

en: He has an unusual ability in English.
He is inferior to his younger brother in English.
He teaches mathematics as well as English.
He speaks English and French.
He can speak both English and French.
He can speak German, not to mention English and French.
zh: 他会说德语，更不用说英语和法语了。

en: He doesn't speak either English or French.
zh: 英语和法语他都不会说。

en: He is capable of teaching both English and French.
He can speak English and French.
He speaks Spanish, not to mention English and German.
zh: 他会说西班牙语，更不用说英语和德语了。

en: He speaks only English and German, neither of which I understand.
zh: 他只说英语和德语，这两种我一个都听不懂。

en: He speaks English, and French as well.
zh: 他会说英语，还会说法语。

en: He got full marks in English.
He could not make himself understood in English.
zh: 他没法用英语把意思表达清楚。

en: He keeps a diary in English.
He read a book written in English.
He expressed himself very well in English.
He can make himself understood in English.
zh: 他能用英语把意思表达清楚。

en: He is ahead of our class in English.
He is ahead of us in English.
He is much inferior to me in English.
He is ahead of his class in English.
zh: 他在班里的英语成绩是领先的。

en: He got 90 marks out of 100 in English.
He got 90% in English.
He speaks French as well as English.
zh: 他的法语说得和英语一样好。

en: He not only speaks English, he speaks French, too.
zh: 他不仅会说英语，还会说法语。

en: He not only speaks English, he speaks French as well.
zh: 他不但会说英语，而且也会说法语。

en: He is superior to the rest in so far as he can speak English.
zh: 他的优势就在于他会说英语。

en: He can speak English, and French as well.
zh: 他会说英语，也会说法语。

en: He cannot speak English, much less German.
zh: 他连英语都不会说，更别提德语了。

en: He can't speak English, can he?
He can't read English, much less German.
zh: 他连英文都看不懂，更别提德文了。

en: While he likes English, he is weak in mathematics.
zh: 虽然他喜欢英语，但他数学挺差的。

en: He is poor at English but second to none in mathematics.
zh: 他的英语很烂，但数学不比任何人差。

en: He is weak in English.
He can speak a little English.
He can't speak much English.
He can hardly speak any English.
He can speak just a little English.
He can speak only a little English.
He can only speak a little English.
He has made little progress in his English.
English is not easy for him to learn.
zh: 英语对他来说不太好学。

en: He likes English very much.
He learned to swim.
He is such a good English speaker.
He seems unable to swim.
He can swim.
He is fond of swimming.
He likes to swim.
It seems that he is unable to swim.
He is a very fast swimmer.
He went to sea to swim.
He is afraid to swim.
He is afraid of swimming.
He learned how to swim.
He suggested that we go for a swim.
He is a good swimmer.
He boasts that he can swim well.
zh: 他吹牛说自己游泳游得很好。

en: He left Japan for good.
He says he is leaving the country for good.
zh: 他说他要回国，再也不回来了。

en: He said good-bye for good.
He will leave here for good.
He has gone back to California for good.
He had returned to England forever.
zh: 他已经永远回到了英国。

en: He left Africa forever.
From a movie star he became a statesman.
zh: 他从影星变成了政治家。

en: He seldom, if ever, goes to the cinema.
zh: 他很少看电影，甚至根本不去。

en: He lost his cinema ticket.
He lost his movie ticket.
He lost his ticket for the movie.
Since he's crazy about movies, he watches as many movies as he can.
zh: 他是个影迷，所以能看多少电影就看多少。

en: He seldom, if ever, goes to the movies.
zh: 他很少去看电影，几乎从不去。

en: He has done this for profit.
He did it for the money.
zh: 他是为了钱才这么干的。

en: He adores the movies.
He is the manager of the marketing department.
He has little appetite for lack of exercise.
zh: 他因为缺乏运动，没什么胃口。

en: He has excellent reflexes.
He crossed the ground.
He put emphasis on the importance of the exercise.
zh: 他强调了锻炼的重要性。

en: He failed to pass his driving test.
He is bent on getting the driving license.
He works on the railroad as a driver.
You can't be too careful when driving a car.
zh: 开车的时候，再怎么小心都不为过。

en: His driving skill is very amateur.
He is good at driving.
I think he is a good driver.
He drives roughly.
He is a bad driver.
Do you think he is a good driver?
He had the luck to catch the train.
He denied the rumor.
He is not a man to tell a lie.
He tends to tell lies.
He abhorred lying.
He hated lying.
He kept on telling lies.
I suspect that he is lying.
I can't help suspecting that he is lying.
zh: 我忍不住怀疑他在撒谎。

en: He was punished for lying.
He seems to have told a lie.
He is far from telling a lie.
He doesn't tell lies.
He doesn't lie.
He says he has never told a lie, which is a lie.
zh: 他说他从没撒过谎，但这本身就是个谎话。

en: He is notorious as a liar.
He availed himself of the rain.
zh: 他借着下雨的机会行事。

en: He went out prepared for rain.
zh: 他做好防雨准备才出门。

en: He sought shelter from the rain.
He goes to work on foot every day except on rainy days.
zh: 除了雨天，他每天都走路去上班。

en: He uses extreme care when he drives in the rain.
zh: 下雨天他开车格外小心。

en: He walked on and on in the rain.
zh: 他在雨里一直走个不停。

en: He is in bad health because he walked in the rain.
zh: 因为淋了雨，他身体变差了。

en: He went out in the rain.
He went on walking in the rain without an umbrella.
zh: 他没打伞，继续在雨里走。

en: He walked into the rain.
He predicted there would be rain.
He arrived on time in spite of the rain.
zh: 尽管下雨，他还是准时到了。

en: He was drenched by the rain.
He was wet to the skin from the rain.
He is dreaming of becoming an astronaut.
zh: 他梦想成为一名宇航员。

en: He was the first man to float in space.
zh: 他是第一个在太空漫步的人。

en: He made a sharp turn to the right.
He extended his right arm.
He is a sly fox.
He was converted from his licentious living.
zh: 他改掉了那种放荡的生活习惯。

en: He was punished for drunken driving.
He gave me a lecture on drinking.
zh: 他跟我讲了一大堆关于喝酒的道理。

en: He drank himself to death.
He has retired, but he is still an actual leader.
zh: 他退休了，但还是个实权人物。

en: He opened the drawer, and took out a letter.
zh: 他打开抽屉，拿出一封信。

en: He turned back to help her up the stairs.
He put his things carelessly in the drawer.
zh: 他随手把东西扔进抽屉里。

en: He came to Tokyo with the dream of becoming rich.
zh: 他怀揣发财梦来到了东京。

en: He went to Tokyo with the dream of becoming rich.
zh: 他怀揣发财梦去了东京。

en: He threw the ball to first base.
He would have been able to enter a good university easily if he had tried, but he entered a vocational school instead.
zh: 他要是努力点，本来能轻松考上好大学，但他却上了职校。

en: He was recognized as a first-class singer.
zh: 他被公认为是一流的歌手。

en: It is no exaggeration to say that he is a first-rate writer.
zh: 说他是顶级作家一点都不夸张。

en: He is a musician of the first rank.
He spent all night cramming for the test.
zh: 他通宵复习，临时抱佛脚。

en: He saw at a glance that his daughter had been crying.
zh: 他一眼就看出他女儿哭过。

en: He took out a piece of paper.
He fell in love with the girl at first sight.
zh: 他对那个女孩一见钟情。

en: He wrote a letter on a piece of paper.
zh: 他在一张纸上写了封信。

en: He's broke.
He made his way to presidency step by step.
zh: 他一步步爬到了总统的位置。

en: He found a dog abandoned in the wood.
zh: 他在树林里发现了一只被遗弃的狗。

en: He missed the train by one minute.
zh: 他晚了一分钟，没赶上火车。

en: I felt that he skirted around the most important issues.
zh: 我觉得他绕开了最核心的问题。

en: He came first. Therefore he got a good seat.
zh: 他来得最早，所以坐到了好位子。

en: He came first. That's why he got a good seat.
zh: 他是第一个到的，这就是为什么他能坐到好位子。

en: He will win the first prize.
He lay awake all night.
He tossed and turned all night.
zh: 他整晚翻来覆去地睡不着。

en: He is popular among general readers.
zh: 他在普通读者中很受欢迎。

en: He is popular with the people at large.
zh: 他在老百姓中很受欢迎。

en: He was killed by a single bullet.
He shared his box of biscuits with all his friends.
zh: 他把那一盒饼干分给所有的朋友一起吃。

en: He lives and works there all the year round.
zh: 他一年到头都在那儿工作生活。

en: He skipped a grade.
He died one year ago.
He had been dry for almost a year, but he fell off the wagon around New Year's Day.
zh: 他戒酒快一年了，但元旦左右又破戒了。

en: He will work one day and loaf the next day.
He earns twenty dollars a day.
He does nothing but play all day.
He kept silent all day.
He slept all day.
He was completely tired from walking all day.
zh: 他走了一整天路，累得够呛。

en: He has been absorbed in the novel all day without eating.
zh: 他看那本小说看入迷了，一整天都没顾上吃饭。

en: He searched all day for the letter.
zh: 他找那封信找了一整天。

en: He did nothing but lie in bed all day.
zh: 他整天就躺在床上，啥也不干。

en: He hunted for his missing cat all day.
zh: 他找那只丢了的猫找了一整天。

en: He was watching television all day.
He played tennis all day long.
He did nothing but watch TV all day.
zh: 他整天除了看电视什么都不干。

en: He does nothing but complain all day long.
He slumbered out the whole day.
He's always on the go, from morning to night.
zh: 他从早忙到晚，一刻也不停。

en: He exists on 3,000 yen a day.
zh: 他每天靠三千日元过日子。

en: He turned down her request for a day off.
He idled away a whole day.
He can't do without cigarettes even for a day.
Exhausted from a day's work, he went to bed much earlier than usual.
zh: 干了一天活累坏了，他比平时早得多就睡了。

en: He is in the habit of eating only two meals a day.
zh: 他习惯一天只吃两顿饭。

en: He does a kind act once a day.
zh: 他坚持每天做一件好事。

en: He set out to read the book through in a day.
zh: 他打算一天之内就把那本书读完。

en: Not a day passed by but he regretted what he had done.
zh: 他没有哪一天不后悔自己做过的事。

en: Not a day went by when he didn't regret what he'd done.
zh: 他没有哪一天不在后悔自己以前做的事。

en: He will be back in a day or two.
He got the first prize.
He was after the first prize.
What he has once heard he never forgets.
zh: 他听过一遍就再也不会忘了。

en: He has never cleaned his room.
zh: 他从来不打扫自己的房间。

en: He has never played golf.
zh: 他从来没打过高尔夫球。

en: He could listen to seven people at once.
zh: 他能同时听七个人说话。

en: He carried six boxes at a time.
He tried more than once, only to fail.
zh: 他试了好几次，结果都失败了。

en: He made a great fortune in his lifetime.
He lives from hand to mouth without saving a penny.
zh: 他挣多少花多少，一点钱也没攒下。

en: He threw a piece of meat to a dog.
He was deaf to all arguments.
zh: 别人怎么劝他都听不进去。

en: He remained single all his life.
He expects to succeed in winning a scholarship by studying hard.
zh: 他想通过努力学习拿到奖学金。

en: He studied hard and passed the test.
He studied hard only to fail in the exam.
zh: 他学习那么努力，结果还是没考及格。

en: He worked hard only to fail again.
zh: 他拼命工作，结果还是又失败了。

en: He studied very hard.
He is a hard worker, and I'm sure that he will succeed in that new job.
zh: 他工作很拼，我相信他在那份新工作中肯定能行。

en: He worked very hard.
He must work hard.
He seemed to be tired from working hard.
zh: 他看起来工作得很辛苦，挺累的。

en: He worked hard, so that he succeeded.
zh: 他因为工作努力，所以成功了。

en: He worked hard. Otherwise he would have failed.
zh: 他挺努力的，不然就失败了。

en: He worked hard, finishing the report in one week.
zh: 他加班加点，一个星期就写完了报告。

en: He ran as fast as he could.
He tried hard in vain.
He did his best to drink.
He must have studied English hard.
zh: 他以前学英语一定很下功夫。

en: He worked hard to no purpose.
His hard work will make him.
zh: 他的努力会让他成功的。

en: He tried hard, but he failed.
zh: 他努力过了，但还是失败了。

en: He's selling hot dogs to beat the band.
He attributes his success to hard work.
zh: 他觉得自己的成功归功于努力。

en: He emphasized the importance of working hard.
zh: 他强调了努力工作的重要性。

en: He worked hard; as a result he made a great success.
zh: 他工作非常努力，结果取得了巨大的成功。

en: He tried hard, but failed.
He tried hard only to find that he was not fit for the job.
zh: 他很努力，结果发现自己根本不适合这份工作。

en: He tries hard.
He remained poor all his life.
He has dedicated his life to the preservation of nature.
zh: 他把一生都献给了自然保护事业。

en: He devoted his life to his study.
He devoted his life to education.
zh: 他把自己的一生都献给了教育。

en: He has more books than he can read in his life.
zh: 他的书多到一辈子也读不完。

en: He stayed awake all night wondering why the deal went wrong.
zh: 他彻夜未眠，想不通这笔买卖到底哪儿出了岔子。

en: He did not sleep a wink.
He set out on a lonely journey.
zh: 他踏上了一个人的旅程。

en: He likes to travel alone.
He had his only son killed in the war.
zh: 他的独生子在战争中牺牲了。

en: He became alone in the world and was chilled to the bone.
zh: 他变得举目无亲，感到一阵透骨的寒意。

en: He was alone.
He was seated all alone.
Being left alone, he sank into meditation.
zh: 剩下他一个人时，他陷入了沉思。

en: The moment he was alone, he wrote the letter.
zh: 一剩下他一个人，他就写了那封信。

en: He likes to travel by himself.
He lives by himself.
He had dinner by himself.
He lives in the forest alone.
It is as if he is carrying his cross all by himself.
zh: 就像是他一个人在背负所有的重担。

en: He likes taking a walk by himself.
He likes to take a solitary walk.
He dare not go alone.
He has gone abroad by himself.
He listened to music by himself.
He decided to set out for New York by himself.
He lived there by himself.
He is brave enough to go there by himself.
zh: 他胆子挺大的，敢一个人去那儿。

en: He lives in this lonely place by himself.
zh: 他一个人住在这个冷清的地方。

en: He lives here all alone.
He has traveled around the world in eighty days by himself.
zh: 他一个人用了八十天环游世界。

en: Being an only child, he was the sole inheritor.
zh: 他是独生子，是唯一的继承人。

en: Being an only child, he was the sole heir.
zh: 他是独生子，所以他是唯一的继承人。

en: He is alone.
Sometimes he spends time by himself.
zh: 有时候他会一个人待着。

en: He went there by himself.
He had breakfast all alone.
He left the company on account of personal reasons.
zh: 因为个人原因，他离开公司了。

en: He wanted to come with us.
He does not have anyone to play with.
He worked hard; otherwise he would have failed in the examination.
zh: 他当时学习很努力，要不然考试就挂了。

en: He has been sick for a week.
He hasn't come home since he left last week.
zh: 自从上周走后，他就一直没回过家。

en: He left for Europe a week ago, that is, on the tenth of May.
zh: 他一个星期前去了欧洲，也就是五月十号。

en: He stayed away from school for a week.
He was absent from school for a week.
He plays tennis three times a week.
zh: 他一个星期打三次网球。

en: He has been sick in bed all week.
zh: 他这一整个星期都病在床上。

en: He came again after a week.
He's been grounded for a week.
He lived in France for some time, then went to Italy.
zh: 他在法国住过一段时间，然后去了意大利。

en: He dwelt for a time in France, then went to Italy.
zh: 他在法国待过一阵子，后来去了意大利。

en: He turned up an hour later.
He'll catch up with us in an hour.
zh: 他一小时后就能赶上我们。

en: He has lain there for an hour.
zh: 他在那儿躺了一个小时了。

en: He was laid off.
He stayed in London for a time.
zh: 他在伦敦待过一段时间。

en: He lived here for a time.
He made the trip independent of his company.
zh: 他没跟公司一起，是自己去旅行的。

en: He ate one bite, and then another.
zh: 他吃了一口，紧接着又吃了一口。

en: He listened carefully so that he might not miss a single word.
zh: 他听得很认真，生怕漏掉一个字。

en: He listened very carefully in order not to miss a single word.
zh: 他听得特别仔细，为了不漏掉任何一个字。

en: He gave not a word in reply.
He answered never a word.
He went out of the room without saying any words.
zh: 他没说话就走出房间了。

en: He left the room without saying a word.
zh: 他一言不发地离开了房间。

en: He would often sit for hours without saying a word.
zh: 他经常一坐就是几个小时，一句话也不说。

en: He went out without saying a word.
He would sit for hours without saying a word.
zh: 他会一言不发地坐上好几个小时。

en: He went by me without a single word.
zh: 他从我身边走过，一句话也没说。

en: He went away without saying a word.
He is, in a word, a utopian.
zh: 总之，他是个理想主义者。

en: He is, in a word, a poet.
zh: 简而言之，他就是个诗人。

en: He went from door to door asking for contributions.
He dashed off a letter.
He is apparently a pianist.
He worked ten hours at a stretch.
zh: 他一口气干了十个钟头。

en: He has consistently endeavored to help the poor.
zh: 他一直以来都在尽力帮助穷人。

en: He is nothing more than a clerk.
He is nothing but a businessman.
He stayed in London over a month.
zh: 他在伦敦待了一个多月。

en: He composed three poems in a month.
He said he was going to take a risk.
He was thirsty enough to drink a well dry.
zh: 他渴得能把井水都喝干。

en: He fetched some water from the well.
He dedicated his life to medical work.
zh: 他把一生都献给了医疗工作。

en: He made believe he was a doctor.
He pretended to be a doctor.
He went for the doctor.
He proposed to send for the doctor.
He sent for a doctor.
He is a future doctor.
He kept on drinking in defiance of his doctor's warning.
zh: 他不顾医生的警告，照样喝酒。

en: He took medical advice.
He is said to be qualified as a doctor.
zh: 据说他已经够格当医生了。

en: He stopped smoking on his doctor's advice.
zh: 他听医生的劝把烟戒了。

en: He looked like a doctor.
He looks nothing like a doctor.
zh: 他看着一点也不像个医生。

en: I fancy he is a doctor.
He regretted that he had put off going to the doctor.
zh: 他很后悔没早点去看医生。

en: He was given up on by the doctors.
zh: 医生们都觉得他没救了。

en: He was told to abstain from drinking by the doctor.
He has been told by the doctor to give up smoking, but he cannot seem to give it up.
zh: 医生叫他戒烟，可他怎么也戒不掉。

en: He is bent on becoming a doctor.
He abandoned his hope of becoming a doctor.
zh: 他放弃了当医生的念头。

en: He made a determination to be a doctor.
He was brought up to be a doctor.
zh: 他从小就被培养成一名医生。

en: He studied hard with a view to being a doctor.
zh: 为了当医生，他学习非常刻苦。

en: He made up his mind to be a doctor.
zh: 他下决心要做一名医生。

en: He made up his mind to be a doctor and go to a doctorless village.
zh: 他下定决心要当医生，去那些没有医生的村子。

en: He wishes to become a doctor.
He is proud of not having consulted a doctor.
zh: 他为自己从不看医生而感到自豪。

en: He is famous as a doctor.
He is no good as a doctor.
He has much practical experience as a doctor.
zh: 他当医生的经验很丰富。

en: He became known as a doctor.
zh: 他以医生的身份出了名。

en: He is a doctor and also a novelist.
zh: 他既是医生，也是个小说家。

en: He is not a doctor but a teacher.
zh: 他不是医生，而是个老师。

en: He is not a doctor.
He's not a doctor.
Is he a doctor?
In addition to being a doctor, he is a writer.
zh: 除了当医生，他还是个作家。

en: He was a great poet as well as a doctor.
zh: 他不仅是位医生，还是位伟大的诗人。

en: He is proud of being a doctor.
zh: 他为自己是名医生而自豪。

en: He is a doctor.
He's a doctor.
He was a doctor; moreover a poet.
zh: 他曾是个医生，而且还是个诗人。

en: He studies with a view to becoming a doctor.
zh: 他为了当医生而努力学习。

en: He has lost faith in the doctor.
zh: 他对那个医生失去了信心。

en: He is qualified as a doctor.
In addition to being a physician, he was a master pianist.
zh: 除了是名内科医生，他还是位钢琴大师。

en: He is a professor of the medical department.
He has great influence over the medical world.
zh: 他在医学界很有影响力。

en: He went to America to study medicine.
He devoted himself to the study of medicine.
He was engaged in medical research.
He is engaged in medical research.
He was devoted to medical science.
He is a medical student.
He has drawn up a will.
He left all his property to his wife in his will.
zh: 他在遗嘱里把所有财产都留给了妻子。

en: He committed an illegal act.
He tried different kind of foods one after another.
zh: 他挨个尝了各种不同的食物。

en: He made out really well in the clothing business.
zh: 他的服装生意做得特别好。

en: He seems to deal in clothes.
zh: 他好像是做服装生意的。

en: He used to suffer from stomach aches.
He loaded his stomach with food.
zh: 他往肚子里塞满了食物。

en: He died of cancer of the stomach.
He died of gastric cancer.
He cut a brilliant figure.
He got angry with whoever challenged him.
zh: 谁要是挑战他，他就会跟谁急。

en: He was open to a different way of thinking.
zh: 他乐于接受不同的思维方式。

en: He broke up the chair for firewood.
He broke the window intentionally.
When he came to, he was lying alone on the hill.
zh: 他醒来时，发现自己一个人躺在山上。

en: He plays little part in the decision-making.
zh: 他在决策中没起什么作用。

en: Brought up by a weak father, he is partial to sweets.
zh: 他由性格软弱的父亲抚养长大，特别爱吃甜食。

en: He is a man of weak character.
He doesn't have a mind of his own.
He has a weak will.
He has a strong will.
He hinted at his intention.
He came home in high spirits.
He submitted his written opinion.
He's depressed.
He was fired against his will.
He played an important role on the committee.
zh: 他在委员会中起到了重要作用。

en: He complained that he had not been informed of the committee's decision.
zh: 他抱怨说没人通知他委员会的决定。

en: He was elected chairman of the committee.
He's resigned his position as chairman of the committee.
zh: 他辞去了委员会主席的职务。

en: He's the chairman of the committee.
He is a member of the committee.
He suddenly walked out of the committee meeting.
zh: 他突然从委员会会议上走了出去。

en: He is known to everybody as a great ballplayer.
zh: 大家都知道他是个伟大的球员。

en: He is regarded as a great statesman.
zh: 他被公认为是一位伟大的政治家。

en: He's considered to be a great politician.
zh: 大家觉得他是个了不起的政治家。

en: He is a great statesman, and what is more a great scholar.
zh: 他不仅是个伟大的政治家，更是一个伟大的学者。

en: He is supposed to have been a great statesman.
zh: 据说他以前是个伟大的政治家。

en: He was a great statesman and was elected president.
zh: 他是个伟大的政治家，后来还当选了总统。

en: He came to be known as a great novelist.
zh: 他后来成了一名著名的伟大小说家。

en: He is as great a novelist as ever lived.
zh: 他是有史以来最伟大的小说家之一。

en: He was a great general and statesman.
zh: 他是个伟大的将军和政治家。

en: He is a man of great capacity but of little ability.
zh: 他志向很大，但真本事没多少。

en: He is known as a great painter.
zh: 大家都知道他是个伟大的画家。

en: He is a great scholar, but lacks what is called common sense.
zh: 他是个了不起的学者，但却没什么常识。

en: He is said to be a great scientist.
zh: 听说他是个很厉害的科学家。

en: He is a great scientist.
As great a scientist as he is, he lacks common sense.
zh: 尽管他是个很厉害的科学家，但他却没啥常识。

en: He became a great musician.
zh: 他成了一位伟大的音乐家。

en: He was destined to become a great musician.
zh: 他注定会成为一名伟大的音乐家。

en: He was a great musician.
zh: 他曾是一位伟大的音乐家。

en: It seems that he was a great athlete.
zh: 看来他以前是个了不起的运动员。

en: He is known as a great pianist.
zh: 他是出了名的伟大钢琴家。

en: He's putting on airs.
He is a great scholar and what is better, a good teacher.
zh: 他是个了不起的学者，更难得的是，他还是个好老师。

en: He tried to imagine what the client was like.
zh: 他试着想象那个客户长什么样。

en: He used to be well off and generous, but now he lives from hand to mouth.
zh: 他以前挺有钱挺大方的，现在却只能勉强糊口。

en: He used to eat out every day, but he can't afford it.
zh: 他以前天天在外面吃，现在吃不起了。

en: He used to get up early.
He is looking at what used to be my father's desk.
zh: 他正看着那张以前是我父亲用的桌子。

en: He used to walk to his office.
zh: 他以前都是走路去办公室的。

en: He seems to have been rich before.
He used to go to school by bicycle, but he takes a bus now.
zh: 他以前骑车上学，但现在坐公交车了。

en: He used to go to school by bicycle, but now he goes by bus.
zh: 他以前骑自行车上学，现在改成坐公交了。

en: He is better off than before.
zh: 他的日子过得比以前好多了。

en: He weighs a lot more than before.
He came a little earlier than he used to.
zh: 他来得比平时早了一点。

en: He is now better off than before.
zh: 他现在的境况比以前好多了。

en: He studies much harder than before.
zh: 他学习比以前用功多了。

en: He used to go out at night.
He is not as fat as he was.
He didn't used to drink.
He used to smoke, but now he doesn't.
zh: 他以前抽烟，但现在戒了。

en: He's different from before.
He's not the same man he used to be.
zh: 他不再是以前那个样子了。

en: He used to come here on Mondays.
zh: 他以前星期一都会来这儿。

en: He is not strong as before.
He's not as strong as before.
He is not the man that he used to be.
zh: 他不再是以前那个人了。

en: He decided to study harder.
zh: 他决定要更努力地学习。

en: He's not the same as he was before.
He's different than he used to be.
It seemed that he had been very happy.
zh: 他那会儿看起来挺开心的。

en: He had been there before.
Has he stayed here before?
He used to live here.
He visited Italy before.
It is said that he was very rich.
He escaped under cover of the darkness.
He doesn't have enough brains to do sums in his head.
zh: 他脑子不够使，算不了心算。

en: He isn't smart enough to do mental arithmetic.
zh: 他没那么聪明，做不了心算。

en: He isn't smart enough to add up numbers in his head.
zh: 他不够聪明，没法儿心算。

en: He's not smart enough to add numbers in his head.
He felt his way through the darkness.
He groped for the doorknob in the dark.
zh: 他在黑暗里摸索门把手。

en: He was feeling for the light switch in the dark.
He came back after dark.
He was afraid of the dark.
He lit a candle in the dark.
zh: 他在黑暗里点了一支蜡烛。

en: He strained every nerve to see in the darkness.
zh: 他在黑暗中使劲儿想看清东西。

en: He was looking for something in the dark.
zh: 他在黑灯瞎火地找东西。

en: He gave a sigh of relief.
He has to maintain a large family on a small salary.
zh: 他得靠那点工资养活一大家子人。

en: He is leading a life of ease.
He is thought to be difficult to deal with.
zh: 大家都觉得他这人挺难搞的。

en: He yielded to pressure.
He has a grip of steel.
He put out his hand to me for a handshake.
He refused to shake hands.
He keeps bad company.
zh: 他总跟些不三不四的人混在一起。

en: He came in spite of bad weather.
zh: 尽管天气不好，他还是来了。

en: He was forced to go back because of the bad weather.
zh: 因为天气太差，他不得不原路返回。

en: He is fighting with his back against the wall.
He's up to no good.
He regretted his misdeeds.
zh: 他后悔自己做过的那些错事了。

en: He has taken on bad ways.
He led a life of vice.
He will get an average mark at worst.
zh: 他再怎么着也能拿个平均分。

en: He suffered from a bad cold.
He fell among bad companions.
zh: 他跟一帮坏人混到一块儿去了。

en: He broke down when he heard the bad news.
zh: 听到坏消息他整个人都崩溃了。

en: He doesn't know even the proper way of greeting people.
zh: 他连怎么跟人打招呼都不懂。

en: He went out without saying good-bye.
zh: 他招呼也不打一声就走了。

en: He spoke to me pleasantly.
zh: 他跟我说话客客气气的。

en: He felt hungry for affection.
He wants affection.
He drove his car to Yokohama.
He was excited by nationalistic sentiment.
zh: 民族主义情绪让他很激动。

en: He dearly loves his school.
He died leaving his beloved children behind.
zh: 他去世了，留下了他心爱的孩子们。

en: He is a lovable person.
He is a man with a lovable character.
He wrote her to the effect that he loved her.
zh: 他给她写了封信，大意是他爱她。

en: He lost himself in his studies.
zh: 他整个人都钻进学习里去了。

en: He makes little of our efforts.
zh: 他压根没把我们的努力当回事。

en: He deserves our reverence.
He walked vigorously ahead of us.
zh: 他大步流星地走在我们前面。

en: He is trespassing on our private property.
zh: 他闯进了我们的私有领地。

en: He is our leader, and must be respected as such.
zh: 他是我们的领导，理应受到尊重。

en: He fell short of our expectation.
He made an apology.
He has given us indecent wages.
zh: 他给我们的工资低得离谱。

en: He is able to run faster than I am.
He can run faster than me.
He looked me right in the eye.
He is an utter stranger to me.
He edged himself into our conversation.
zh: 他硬插进了我们的对话。

en: He showed his agreement by a sight inclination of his head.
He has no more than one hundred books.
zh: 他总共也就不到一百本书。

en: He made the best of his small income.
zh: 他靠那点微薄的收入精打细算过日子。

en: He missed the last train by a minute.
zh: 他就差了一分钟，没赶上末班车。

en: He works for a mere pittance.
zh: 他挣的那点钱少得可怜。

en: He saved all of what little money he earned.
zh: 他把挣的那点微薄工资全攒了下来。

en: He had no more than 10,000 yen.
He has no more than 100 dollars.
zh: 他身上也就一百来块美金。

en: He is a clerk at the Bank of Washington.
zh: 他在华盛顿银行当职员。

en: He kindly took the trouble to see me home.
zh: 他人很好，还特意送我回家。

en: He went all the way to see her, only to find she was away.
zh: 他大老远跑去看她，结果她不在。

en: He doesn't bother to comb his hair.
He went out of his way to assist me.
zh: 他特地费心过来协助我。

en: He went out of his way to help me.
He went out of his way to find the house for me.
zh: 他特地费心帮我找那房子。

en: He took the trouble to show me the way to the station.
zh: 他还专门带路送我去车站。

en: He came all the way to talk over a problem with me.
zh: 他大老远跑来跟我商量一个问题。

en: He kindly took the trouble to send me home.
zh: 他人真好，还专门送我回家。

en: He took the trouble to send me the book.
zh: 他还特意把那本书寄给我。

en: He took the trouble to assist the poor man.
zh: 他还费心去帮那个穷人。

en: He hurt her feelings on purpose.
He stepped on my foot on purpose.
He kept me waiting on purpose.
He kicked me on purpose.
He didn't answer the question on purpose.
zh: 他是故意不回答那个问题的。

en: He didn't do it on purpose.
It occurred to me that he had done it on purpose.
zh: 我突然想到他是故意的。

en: He told us a very exciting story of adventure.
zh: 他给我们讲了一个非常刺激的冒险故事。

en: He told us a very exciting adventure story.
zh: 他给我们讲了一个非常精彩的冒险故事。

en: He is holding his books under his arm.
He deals with my company.
zh: 他跟我们公司有业务往来。

en: He is well known in our country.
zh: 他在我们这儿挺有名气的。

en: He has a face which is easy to understand.
zh: 他这人情绪全写在脸上。

en: He gives plain, simple explanations.
His selfishness got in the way of his promotion.
zh: 他的自私耽误了他升职。

en: Egotist though he was, his parents loved him.
zh: 虽说他这人挺自大的，但他父母还是很疼他。

en: He is worthy to be captain of our team.
zh: 他配得上当咱们队的队长。

en: He is as good as any player on our team.
zh: 他不比咱们队里任何一个队员差。

en: He had the bad habit of drinking too much wine.
He drank a bottle of wine.
He has a good palate for wine.
He can't go without wine for even a day.
He dropped his wineglass and broke its stem.
zh: 他把酒杯摔了，杯脚断了。

en: He emptied a glass of wine.
He isn't a man to take a bribe.
zh: 他不是那种会收受贿赂的人。

en: He is expert with a word processor.
zh: 他用文档处理软件用得很溜。

en: He has gone to London.
He behaves as if he had visited London.
zh: 他搞得好像去过伦敦似的。

en: He has started for London.
He lives in a poor district of London.
zh: 他住在伦敦的一个贫民区。

en: He lived in the center of London.
He made to settle down in the suburbs of London.
zh: 他打算在伦敦郊区定居。

en: He lives in the suburbs of London.
While in London, he visited the British Museum.
zh: 他在伦敦的时候参观了大英博物馆。

en: He went to London, where he stayed for a week.
zh: 他去了伦敦，在那儿待了一个星期。

en: He set off for London.
He took many pictures in London.
zh: 他在伦敦拍了好多照片。

en: He is either in London or in Paris.
zh: 他要么在伦敦，要么在巴黎。

en: It says in the program that he's playing Romeo.
zh: 节目单上说他演罗密欧。

en: He tried to make the robot run.
zh: 他试着让机器人跑起来。

en: He made a robot.
He is known as a rock singer.
zh: 他是个有名的摇滚歌手。

en: He is keen on rock music, but she is even more so.
zh: 他挺迷摇滚的，她比他更迷。

en: He acquired Russian quickly.
He speaks Russian perfectly.
He is well acquainted with Russian.
He can speak Russian as well.
He can speak Russian, too.
He can also speak Russian.
He can both speak and write Russian.
He boarded a plane bound for Los Angeles.
zh: 他上了一架飞往洛杉矶的飞机。

en: He stopped over at Los Angeles and Chicago.
zh: 他在洛杉矶和芝加哥都中转过。

en: He put his finger on the cause of the rocket's failure to orbit.
zh: 他一针见血地指出了火箭没能入轨的原因。

en: He went to Rome, where he saw a lot of old buildings.
zh: 他去了罗马，在那儿看了不少古建筑。

en: He let go of the rope.
He pulled the rope.
He caught hold of the rope.
He held on to the rope.
He blew out the candle.
It is believed that he will win the race.
zh: 大家都觉得他能赢这场比赛。

en: He took part in the race.
He psyched himself up for the race.
He took the first place in the race.
He chucked me the apple.
zh: 他随手把苹果丢给了我。

en: He threw me the apple.
He carried a bag full of apples.
He reached for the apple.
He knows nothing about Lincoln, or for that matter, about America.
zh: 他对林肯一点也不了解，对美国的事也一样。

en: He acted the part of King Lear.
zh: 他演了李尔王这个角色。

en: He came to take a walk every morning after rehabilitation.
zh: 康复之后，他每天早上都过来散步。

en: He was a big man called Little John.
zh: 他是个大个子，名字却叫小约翰。

en: He became a handsome young man.
He bore himself well.
He behaved well.
He expressed himself in good English.
He is looked up to as a leader.
He is a professor of English at Leeds.
zh: 他是利兹大学的英语教授。

en: He is absorbed in the study of Latin.
He cannot avoid traveling to work during the rush hours.
zh: 他上班没法避开高峰期。

en: He is listening to the radio.
He turned on the radio.
He plugged in the radio.
zh: 他插上了收音机的插头。

en: He learned how to put a radio together.
zh: 他学会了怎么组装收音机。

en: He knows how to make a radio.
He drove the car, listening to music on the radio.
zh: 他开着车，听着收音机里的音乐。

en: He started to learn Spanish from the radio.
zh: 他开始通过广播学西班牙语。

en: He has a racket.
He put down his racket.
He hit the ball with his racket.
He was a rugby player.
zh: 他以前是个橄榄球运动员。

en: He is good at rugby.
He equipped himself with a rifle.
zh: 他给自己配了一把步枪。

en: He picked up the rifle and aimed it at the target.
zh: 他拿起步枪，瞄准了目标。

en: He hit a fly into right field.
zh: 他击出了一个右外野高飞球。

en: He came tumbling after.
He immigrated to Brazil in search of a better life.
zh: 为了过上更好的生活，他移民到了巴西。

en: He crossed the Pacific Ocean in a sailboat.
zh: 他驾着帆船横渡了太平洋。

en: He started his voyage around the world in his sailboat.
zh: 他驾着帆船开始了环球航行。

en: He often eats fish for dinner.
He is either drunk or mad.
zh: 他不是喝醉了就是疯了。

en: He often entertained his friends over the weekend.
He used to bully his friends.
He's a man of his word.
He will often forget his promise.
zh: 他经常把承诺忘在脑后。

en: He would often sit up until late at night.
zh: 他以前常坐到深更半夜。

en: He often used to stay up until late at night.
He often stays up late at night.
He often worried his mother.
He often walks with his hand in his pocket.
zh: 他走路时经常把手揣在兜里。

en: He sat in the front so as to be able to hear.
zh: 他坐在前面是为了能听得清。

en: He often paints landscapes.
He often goes to the movies together with her.
zh: 他经常和她一起去看电影。

en: He often goes to the cinema with her.
zh: 他经常跟她一块儿去电影院。

en: He works hard. So he does.
zh: 他工作挺努力的，还真是。

en: He works hard and he is honest.
zh: 他工作很努力，人也挺实在的。

en: He often shows his anger.
He often eats out on Saturday nights.
zh: 他周六晚上经常在外面吃饭。

en: He would often go fishing.
He often leaves his umbrella on a train.
zh: 他经常把雨伞落在火车上。

en: He often uses a subway.
He is often late for school.
He listened closely to the speaker.
zh: 他听演讲听得特别认真。

en: He would often go fishing in the river.
zh: 他以前经常去河边钓鱼。

en: He would sit for hours reading detective stories.
zh: 他以前经常一坐几个小时在那儿看侦探小说。

en: He often quotes the Bible.
zh: 他经常引用《圣经》里的内容。

en: He would often go to the library.
He often makes people angry.
He often skipped meals.
He often attributes his failures to bad luck.
zh: 他经常把失败归咎于运气不好。

en: He often looks back on his high school days.
zh: 他经常怀念高中那段日子。

en: He often laughs at his own jokes.
zh: 他讲完笑话经常自己先乐了。

en: He often spends his time idly.
zh: 他经常无所事事地混日子。

en: He was accustomed to frequenting my house.
He often sits by me and listens to music.
zh: 他经常坐在我旁边听音乐。

en: He often lets me use his typewriter.
zh: 他经常借我用他的打字机。

en: He often takes his children to the zoo.
zh: 他经常带孩子去动物园。

en: He used to sit reading for hours.
zh: 他以前经常一坐好几个小时在那儿看书。

en: He is often wild.
He thought it over, and decided not to go.
He would swear at the naughty boys in the neighborhood.
zh: 他以前总爱骂邻居家那些调皮的孩子。

en: He often makes mistakes, but he is no fool.
zh: 他经常犯错，但他一点都不傻。

en: He is often taken for a student.
He's often mistaken for a student.
zh: 他经常被人误认成学生。

en: He often walks to school.
He often comes late to school.
He often travels to foreign countries.
He's often late for work.
He often absents himself from meetings.
He haunted the art galleries.
zh: 他以前常在那几家美术馆转悠。

en: He would sit in the sun doing nothing.
zh: 他以前总爱坐在太阳底下发呆。

en: He would often sit for hours without doing anything.
zh: 他以前经常一坐就是几个小时，啥也不干。

en: He answered that he could swim well.
zh: 他回答说他游泳游得特别好。

en: He said he could swim well.
zh: 他说他游泳游得挺好的。

en: He often tries to get rich at a single bound.
zh: 他老想一上来就发大财。

en: How dare he open my letters!
He often leaves his umbrella behind absent-mindedly.
zh: 他经常丢三落四的把雨伞给忘了。

en: He often lies on the bed and reads.
Will he get well?
He hangs around with the wrong group of kids.
zh: 他老跟那一帮不三不四的小孩混在一起。

en: He often appears on TV.
He will get an average mark at best.
zh: 他顶多也就拿个平均分。

en: He doesn't do well because he doesn't make the most of his ability.
zh: 他表现不好是因为他没把本事都发挥出来。

en: He often gets worked up over little things.
zh: 他经常为了一点小事就急眼。

en: He often gets angry about trifles.
zh: 他总为点鸡毛蒜皮的小事生气。

en: He would often go to the hill.
zh: 他以前经常去那座山上。

en: He talks a lot.
He was well brought up.
He would often swim in this river.
zh: 他以前常在这条河里游泳。

en: He often plays the guitar.
As he often tells lies, nobody believes him.
zh: 他老爱撒谎，所以没人信他。

en: Since he often tells lies, nobody believes what he says.
zh: 因为他总撒谎，所以没人相信他说话。

en: He will write for hours at a time.
zh: 他经常一写就是好几个小时。

en: He made a tour of Europe.
He conducted a tour through Europe.
He traveled all over Europe.
He has a claim to be called Europe's leading statesman.
zh: 他称得上是欧洲顶尖的政治家。

en: He returned home by way of Europe.
He has visited Europe several times.
He took a trip to Europe.
He has visited most countries in Europe.
zh: 欧洲的大部分国家他都去过。

en: He left Japan for Europe.
He finally broke up with that woman.
zh: 他最终还是和那个女人分手了。

en: He will be a good husband.
He rented a room on the top floor in order to enjoy a good view.
zh: 为了视野好，他在顶楼租了个房间。

en: He got a good appointment.
zh: 他得到了一份很好的差事。

en: He is not only a good batter but also a wonderful defense.
zh: 他不仅击球厉害，防守也很棒。

en: He has a good son to his credit.
He is said to have been a good teacher.
zh: 听说他以前是个很好的老师。

en: He has a sweet voice.
He is a good student.
He was looking for a good job.
zh: 他当时在找一份好工作。

en: He's a good boy so I like him.
zh: 他是个好孩子，所以我很喜欢他。

en: He is in want of good assistants.
He is seeking a good job.
He thought of a good idea.
He must have been brought up in a good family.
zh: 他肯定出身于一个教养很好的家庭。

en: He chose a good wife.
He will make a good doctor.
zh: 他会成为一名好医生的。

en: He will become a good doctor.
zh: 他会成为一个好医生的。

en: He has got a good camera.
He stood up slowly.
He never stops to think.
She slowly disappeared into the foggy forest.
zh: 她慢慢消失在迷雾森林中。

en: He walks slowly.
He was walking slowly down the street.
zh: 他正沿着街道慢慢走着。

en: He slowly moved forward.
He began to address the audience slowly.
zh: 他开始慢条斯理地对观众演讲。

en: He took his time doing his homework.
He was climbing slowly over the fence.
He entered the room slowly by that door.
zh: 他从那扇门慢慢地走进了房间。

en: He nodded slowly in comprehension.
zh: 他慢慢点头，表示明白了。

en: He has a prejudice against Jews.
He has a sense of humor.
He is devoid of humor.
zh: 他这人一点儿幽默感都没有。

en: He passed on quietly at his home last night.
zh: 他昨晚在家里平静地走了。

en: He died from the cold last night.
He must have drunk too much last night.
He accomplishes whatever he sets out to do.
He is driven.
He lacks motivation.
He blamed his son for neglecting his duty.
zh: 他怪他儿子没尽到责任。

en: He is not swift but sure.
zh: 他动作虽然慢，但办事儿挺稳当。

en: He is a real wheeler-dealer.
zh: 他这人特别会投机钻营。

en: I believe him to be a man of ability.
zh: 我相信他是个有本事的人。

en: I think he's a man of ability.
I think he's a competent person.
I think he's competent.
He is a man who will do what he wants.
He must live by his wits.
He has no choice but to resign.
zh: 除了辞职，他没别的选择了。

en: He managed to forbear his revenge.
zh: 他最后还是忍住了没去报仇。

en: He had barely enough to eat.
He narrowly escaped from the bus when it caught fire.
zh: 公交车着火的时候，他好不容易才逃出来的。

en: He finally kicked the bad habit.
zh: 他总算把那个坏习惯给戒了。

en: He finally reached the hotel.
He came and had dinner with us.
zh: 他过来跟我们一起吃了顿饭。

en: He is likely to come.
He would have succeeded had he tried.
zh: 他当初要是努力一下，早就成了。

en: He has a great storehouse of knowledge about historical details but I seriously doubt that's of any use in life.
zh: 他知道特别多历史细节，但我真不觉得这在生活里能有什么用。

en: He is anxious to know the result.
He is too proud to give up.
zh: 他这人太好强了，不肯放弃。

en: He rubbed the rust off with a file.
zh: 他用锉刀把铁锈锉掉了。

en: He annoys me with questions.
zh: 他老问东问西的，真烦人。

en: He soon recovered his composure.
He'll succeed in time.
He came to repent before long.
He will learn the facts in the course of time.
zh: 时间久了他自然会知道真相的。

en: He ran sheer into the wall.
He was weak enough to succumb to temptation.
zh: 他意志力不强，没禁得起诱惑。

en: He was no longer dependent on his parents.
He has been ill, but is not ill now.
zh: 他之前病了一场，现在已经好了。

en: He could no longer restrain himself.
He has become a memory.
He is no longer a child.
He is no longer in business.
He no longer lives here.
He is no longer here.
He was absorbed in thought.
He is impervious to reason.
He neither spoke nor wept, but went out in silence.
zh: 他没说话也没哭，就那么默默地走掉了。

en: He came all the way from Kyushu to see the Mona Lisa.
zh: 他大老远从九州赶过来，就为了看眼《蒙娜丽莎》。

en: He returned to the country whence he came.
zh: 他回他原来的那个国家了。

en: He began experimenting in making better roads.
zh: 他开始研究怎么能把路修得更好。

en: He was persuaded to be more sensible.
He is old enough to know better.
zh: 他也老大不小了，该懂点事了。

en: He likes green in a lighter shade.
He should have been more careful.
He says that he will study English harder.
zh: 他说他要更努力地学英语。

en: He held over his decision until he got more information.
zh: 他想多了解点儿情况再做决定。

en: He grew a beard to look more mature.
zh: 他为了让自己看着成熟点，特意留了胡子。

en: He is in desperate search of further evidence.
zh: 他正在拼命寻找更多的证据。

en: He must be happier now after having remarried.
zh: 再婚以后，他肯定过得更开心了。

en: He demanded better pay.
He'll never achieve anything unless he works harder.
zh: 他要是不再努力点，就什么都干不成。

en: He is in danger of losing his position unless he works harder.
zh: 他要是不努力，位子恐怕就保不住了。

en: He consoled himself with the thought that it might have been worse.
zh: 他自我安慰说，好在情况还没更糟。

en: He is entitled to better treatment.
zh: 他理应得到更好的待遇。

en: He is after a better job.
He compelled us to come earlier.
zh: 他非得让我们早点过来。

en: He held out his hand for more.
He worked hard so as to save more money.
zh: 他拼命工作，就为了多攒点钱。

en: He resolved to do better work in the future.
zh: 他下定决心以后要好好干。

en: He's learning French so he can get a better salary.
zh: 他在学法语，想拿更高的工资。

en: He is unquestionably the oldest man in the village.
zh: 他肯定是村里年纪最大的人了。

en: He will, no doubt, tell the boss on me.
zh: 他肯定会跟老板打我小报告。

en: He said that if he were there, he would help her.
zh: 他说他当时要在场的话，一定会帮她的。

en: He ought to have come by now.
Has he come yet?
They say that he will never return.
He is now almost as tall as his father.
zh: 他现在快跟他爸一样高了。

en: He has been going with her for almost two years now.
zh: 他跟她在一起快两年了。

en: He promised not to tell another lie.
He has already had lunch.
He hasn't made a record or had a concert for many years.
zh: 他好多年没出过唱片，也没开过演唱会了。

en: Has he arrived yet?
Has he arrived already?
He should have arrived by now.
He can no longer wait.
He knew full well that he didn't have long to live.
zh: 他心里清楚得很，自己活不了多久了。

en: He is not the shy boy he used to be.
zh: 他已经不再是以前那个害羞的男孩了。

en: As he is already of age, he can vote.
zh: 他已经成年了，可以参加投票。

en: He has already gone to bed.
He already went to bed.
He already went to sleep.
He is no longer a boy.
He ranked close to the top.
He was within an ace of success.
He came near to being run over.
He may have already departed.
He has left already.
Has he finished his homework yet?
He has already finished his homework.
He is old enough to understand it.
zh: 他这个年纪，该懂这些了。

en: He is not what he was ten years ago.
zh: 他已经不是十年前的他了。

en: Has he written the letter yet?
He is no longer a member of our club.
zh: 他已经不是我们俱乐部的一员了。

en: Now that he has quit his job, I can't depend on him.
zh: 既然他辞职了，我也指望不上他了。

en: He should have finished it by now.
Has he gone already?
He is beyond hope.
He had already gone.
He has already gone home.
Has he returned yet?
Is he back already?
It is time he went to school.
He made a gesture of impatience.
zh: 他做了个不耐烦的手势。

en: He is over the hill, you know.
zh: 你知道的，他已经走下坡路了。

en: He couldn't overcome the desire for another cigarette.
He lit another cigarette, but immediately put it out.
zh: 他又点了一根烟，但立马就掐了。

en: He signed on for another year.
He is eager to meet her again.
I wonder if he dares try again.
zh: 我在想他敢不敢再试一次。

en: They made him do the work again.
zh: 他们让他把活儿重做一遍。

en: He will be ruined for life.
He is no longer the shy boy he was.
zh: 他不再是以前那个害羞的小男孩了。

en: He is now almost as tall as his father is.
zh: 他现在快跟他爸一样高了。

en: He's already left.
He barely escaped being hit and killed by a car.
zh: 他差点儿就被车撞死了。

en: It is all over with him.
It is about time he got settled down.
He is expected to come home soon.
He does not live there any more.
He got quite well.
He was almost asleep.
He will soon come back.
It will not be long before he leaves the hospital.
He is hard on fifty.
He is already here.
He ought to have arrived here.
He is no longer living here.
He no longer works here.
He doesn't work here anymore.
He was completely fagged out.
He will come back in another two weeks.
He has been on sick leave for a month now.
zh: 他已经请了一个月病假了。

en: He avoids all troublesome tasks.
He began to whistle a tune.
zh: 他开始吹起小曲儿来了。

en: He's two years older than Mary is.
He pasted the notice on the door.
He seldom writes to his parents.
Seldom does he get angry.
He seldom gets angry.
He almost never gets angry.
